name: TangramsVR (itch)
description:
TangramsVR is a virtual reality puzzle game designed for Oculus and HTC Vive. Players face puzzles of outlined objective shapes. Players must move the provided blocks to fit inside the objective. 

Demo Details:  The demo release of TangramsVR contains 10 puzzles in 3 rooms. 

Paid versions: Paid versions will include more puzzles, rooms and other game play improvements.  

Regular Updates:  Our goal is to provide updates each week, adding additional puzzles, rooms, improvements and bug fixes.

Requirements: Oculus Rift with Touch controllers OR an HTC Vive with controllers.
